org.apache.giraph.metrics

类 AggregatedMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.metrics.AggregatedMetrics

  • public class AggregatedMetrics
extends Object
    Map of a bunch of aggregated metrics

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String USER_COMPUTE_MS
      counter for user compute time in milliseconds

        public static final String USER_COMPUTE_MS

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AggregatedMetrics

        public AggregatedMetrics()

    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        public AggregatedMetrics add(String name,
                    long value,
                    String hostnamePartitionId)
        Add value from hostname for a metric.
        参数:
        name - String name of metric
        value - long value to track
        hostnamePartitionId - String host it came from
        返回:
        this

      • add

        public AggregatedMetrics add(WorkerSuperstepMetrics workerMetrics,
                    String hostname)
        Add metrics from worker.
        参数:
        workerMetrics - WorkerSuperstepMetrics from work
        hostname - String hostname of worker
        返回:
        this

      • print

        public AggregatedMetrics print(long superstep,
                      PrintStream out)
        Print the aggregated metrics to the stream provided.
        参数:
        superstep - long number of superstep.
        out - PrintStream to write to.
        返回:
        this

      • get

        public AggregatedMetric get(String name)
        Get AggregatedMetric with given name.
        参数:
        name - String metric to lookup.
        返回:
        AggregatedMetric for given metric name.

      • getAll

        public Map<String,AggregatedMetric> getAll()
        Get map of all aggregated metrics.
        返回:
        Map of all the aggregated metrics.
